title: Citation Metadata
description: Citation metadata associated with a collection

Name.description: The name of the cited resource

Identifier.description: The identifier for the cited resource, e.g., DOI, ISBN, ARK

ResolutionAuthority.description: URI used to resolve the identifier

RelationshipType.description: The nature of the relationship between the cited resource and the collection

MetadataSpecification.description: Required to add in schema information into every record. It includes the schema's name, version, and URL location. The information is controlled through enumerations at the end of this schema.

MetadataSpecificationType.description: This object requires any metadata record that is validated by this schema to provide information about the schema.

URL.description: This element represents the URL where the schema lives. The schema can be downloaded.

Name.description: This element represents the name of the schema.

Version.description: This element represents the version of the schema.
